messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kids being with parents
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/12/2003 9:17:15 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Yeah. I m the magnet here. Ben laughs and yells, There are twenty-three HUNDRED square
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/12/2003 9:17:15 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:
> I'd rather feel too crowded and touched out by my kids (which still happens
> sometimes even though they're older) than the opposite, than wishing they
> wanted to talk to me and sit too close and tell me too many stories and
> sleep
> with me.

Yeah. I'm the "magnet" here. Ben laughs and yells, "There are twenty-three
HUNDRED square feet in this house, and all the living things are within
INCHES of YOU!" <g>

I don't mind....much. I know that in a few years all or most will be gone.
I'll miss it!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
